member.name: IPreviewHandlerFrame.GetWindowContext
member.summary: Gets a list of the keyboard shortcuts for the preview host.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives accelerator table information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPreviewHandlerFrame.TranslateAccelerator
member.summary: Directs the host to handle a keyboard shortcut passed from the preview handler.
member.param: A pointer to a WM_COMMAND or WM_SYSCOMMAND window message that corresponds to a keyboard shortcut.
member.returns: If the keyboard shortcut is one that the host intends to handle, the host will process it and return S_OK; otherwise, it returns S_FALSE.

member.name: IPreviewHandlerFrame
member.summary: Enables preview handlers to pass keyboard shortcuts to the host. This interface retrieves a list of keyboard shortcuts and directs the host to handle a keyboard shortcut.
